Effect: Cruel Hand.description: You take a -2 status penalty to rolls you make as part of a fortune effect.

Effect: Curse Of The Everpresent Sonata (Moderate)

Effect: Dancing Lights (Cosmic Transcend.name: Effect: Dancing Lights (Cosmic Transcendence)
Effect: Dancing Lights (Cosmic Transcend.description:
Granted by @Compendium[oracles.oracles-revelation-spells.u3iv4nM8ocZV1M95]{Dancing Lights (Cosmic Transcendence)}.

As long as you are adjacent to a dancing light, you recieve a +1 status bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, or Will saves.

Effect: Ghost Sound (Lost in Reverie).name: Effect: Ghost Sound (Lost in Reverie)
Effect: Ghost Sound (Lost in Reverie).description:
Granted by Ghost Sound (Lost in Reverie).

You're distracted and takes a –2 status penalty to Perception and -1 status penalty to saves against mental effects for 1 minute, but you can take a single concentrate action to end the effect.

Effect: Inebriant Soujourning.name: Effect: Inebriant Soujourning
Effect: Inebriant Soujourning.description:
Granted by @Compendium[oracles.oracle-feats.1M4IaCxUQeVYn6pb]{Inebriant Soujourning}.

Journey of Mind - The next time you attempt to Recall Knowledge, you can roll twice and use the better result.

Journey of Body - The next time you attempt an Athletics check, you can roll twice and use the better result.

Journey of Heart - The next time you attempt a save against a mental effect, you can roll twice and use the better result.

Journey of Soul - The next time you attempt a save against a death effect or a recovery check, you can roll twice and use the better result

Effect: Overwhelmed.name: Effect: Overwhelmed
Effect: Overwhelmed.description: Drawing upon your mystery's power while your curse is at its worst causes an irreconcilable conflict between you and the sources of your power. Immediately after casting a revelation spell while under the moderate effect of your curse, you are overwhelmed. While overwhelmed, you can't Cast or Sustain any revelation spells-you effectively lose access to those spells. You can still @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} to reduce the effects of your curse and regain a Focus Point, but doing so doesn't allow you to cast further revelation spells. These effects last until you rest for 8 hours and make your daily preparations, at which point your curse returns to its basic state. At higher levels, you can grow to withstand your curse's major and even extreme effects, enabling you to cast more revelation spells without becoming overwhelmed.

Effect: Rage (Soaked in Blood).name: Effect: Rage (Soaked in Blood)
Effect: Rage (Soaked in Blood).description:
Requirements You aren't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or raging, and you are overwhelmed by your curse

You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:

  • You deal 2 additional damage with melee weapons and unarmed attacks. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a -1 penalty to AC.
  • You can't use actions with the concentrate trait unless they also have the rage trait. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} while raging.

After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoint based on level and con mod
  • Enables rage property for rage damage
  • Sets token effect
  • Increases rage damage based on curse severity

Effect: Time Sense (Temporal Flux).name: Effect: Time Sense (Temporal Flux)
Effect: Time Sense (Temporal Flux).description:
Granted by Time Sense (Temporal Flux)

You recieve a -1 circumstance penalty to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check you take before your next turn that requires extremely precise timing. You are temporarily immune to the spell for 1 day.

Effect: Trance of Instinct.name: Effect: Trance of Instinct
Effect: Trance of Instinct.description:
Granted by @Compendium[oracles.oracle-feats.PFGH5Hb9Sd0rHC3q]{Trance of Instinct}

Minor You gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks.

Moderate You gain an Athletics skill feat for which you meet the prerequisites. You can choose this skill feat each time you enter this trance.

Major Your status bonus to Athletics increases to +2. If you are a master in Athletics, you gain an additional Athletics skill feat for which you meet the prerequisites. You can choose both of these skill feats each time you enter this trance.

Extreme Your status bonus to Athletics increases to +3.

Effect: Trance of Secrets.name: Effect: Trance of Secrets
Effect: Trance of Secrets.description:
Granted by @Compendium[oracles.oracle-feats.Z846KJjMBTpB31g7]{Trance of Secrets}

Minor Your mystery's words come out in a strange whisper that they can't understand, and yet do. Allies within 30 feet who can hear you gain a +1 status bonus to Recall Knowledge checks.

Moderate Your mystic words imparts important, yet unknowable lessons. Once while your trance is active, allies within 30 feet who can hear you can make a Recall Knowledge check as a free action at the beginning of their turn.

Major The impossible words you spew become faster, louder and more deeply magical. Your allies treat critical failures on Recall Knowledge checks as failures and successes as critical successes. The status bonus to Recall Knowledge checks increases to +2.

Extreme Your allies truly understand the secrets of your mystery not through their ears, but their souls. Your status bonus to Recall Knowledge checks increases to +3. Allies can make a Recall Knowledge check as a free action once per turn instead of once while the trance is active.

Note: while the PF2e system applies the aura to you, you are not affected by trance of secrets.

Effect: Trance of Secrets (Extreme).name: Effect: Trance of Secrets (Extreme)
Effect: Trance of Secrets (Extreme).description: Extreme Your allies truly understand the secrets of your mystery not through their ears, but their souls. Your status bonus to Recall Knowledge checks increases to +3. Allies can make a Recall Knowledge check as a free action once per turn instead of once while the trance is active.

Effect: Trance of Secrets (Major).name: Effect: Trance of Secrets (Major)
Effect: Trance of Secrets (Major).description: Major The impossible words you spew become faster, louder and more deeply magical. Your allies treat critical failures on Recall Knowledge checks as failures and successes as critical successes. The status bonus to Recall Knowledge checks increases to +2.

Effect: Trance of Secrets (Minor/Moderat.name: Effect: Trance of Secrets (Minor/Moderate)
Effect: Trance of Secrets (Minor/Moderat.description:
Minor Your mystery's words come out in a strange whisper that they can't understand, and yet do. Allies within 30 feet who can hear you gain a +1 status bonus to Recall Knowledge checks.

Moderate Your mystic words imparts important, yet unknowable lessons. Once while your trance is active, allies within 30 feet who can hear you can make a Recall Knowledge check as a free action at the beginning of their turn.

Effect: Trance of Seeing.name: Effect: Trance of Seeing
Effect: Trance of Seeing.description:
Granted by @Compendium[oracles.oracle-feats.dxZqqBYj2Dt7ZHfP]{Trance of Seeing}

Minor Your vision is boosted. Your DC to hit @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} creatures is reduced by 2 and you gain a +1 status bonus to Perception for the duration.

Moderate You begin seeing when it would otherwise be impossible. You gain darkvision if you did not already have it. The flat check to target creatures that are Hidden to you is 5 and the flat check to target creatures concealed to you is 2.

Major You gain an absolute sense of vision that defies possibility. You treat saving throws against visual effects as one degree better for the duration, your status bonus to Perception increases to +2, and once per turn you can take the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Seek]{Seek} action as a free action.

Extreme Nothing can deceive your sight. Your status bonus to Perception increases to +3 and you gain lifesense as a precise sense with a range of 60 feet.

Effect: Trance of Swaying.name: Effect: Trance of Swaying
Effect: Trance of Swaying.description:
Minor You become more graceful as you sway from side to side. You have a +1 status bonus to Reflex saves.

Moderate You become enveloped in a strange dance that nobody else could hope to copy. You can Step at the end of your turn as a free action.

Major You move so fast that it is barely feasible to see you as the person you were moments ago. Your dance increases your status bonus to Reflex saves to +2, and when you get a success on a Reflex save, you critically succeed instead.

Extreme Your motions are nearly unstoppable. Your status bonus to Reflex saves increases to +3. You gain the effects of a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement} and you can Step 10 feet.

Special If you are an oracle with the fire mystery, when you are in this trance and under the effects of your major or extreme curse and you roll a failure on a Reflex save against a damaging effect, you take half damage.

Spell Effect: Doomsaying.name: Spell Effect: Doomsaying
Spell Effect: Doomsaying.description:
Granted by @Compendium[oracles.oracles-revelation-spells.mkwJihuJVPCv0Z1X]{Doomsaying}.

The next time they make an attack roll or save, the target rolls twice and takes the lower result, after which, the spell ends

Spell Effect: Fractal Frosting (9th).name: Spell Effect: Fractal Frosting (9th)
Spell Effect: Fractal Frosting (9th).description:
Granted by @Compendium[oracles.oracles-revelation-spells.VVBmn8DPIInJDxjw]{Fractal Frosting}.

For the duration, when you cast ray of frost, the target takes a -5-foot status penalty to its speed for 1 round on a success or a -15-foot status penalty to its speed on a critical success.

Spell Effect: Mind's Eye Wink (Critical.description:
Granted by @Compendium[oracles.oracles-revelation-spells.JEBKmE73asQ8BW1u]{Mind's Eye Wink}

On a failure, the holder or wielder takes a -1 circumstance penalty to all checks that involve using the object; or a -2 circumstance on a critical failure. A creature can attempt to disbelieve the effect as normal after using a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action. If it successfully disbelieves, it ignores the effect for the remaining duration.

Spell Effect: Monstrous Charge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.oracles.oracles-revelation-spells.3VzkXeFQLaBqyNkc]{Monstrous Charge}
